page.title: 07Tranportation
page.content: {Roads:}The A596(T) runs North from the populated area of our Block towards Maryport and on to Carlisle. The B5296 runs South through part of the South East corner of the Block to Distington where it joins the A595(T) enroute to Whitehaven. The A66 enters the Block from the East and is the main link road between West Cumbria and the rest of Britain, joining the{M6 Motorway some 40 miles distance at Penrith. A new Western Industrial Route joining the A66 with{Derwent Howe}is being prepared so that heavy traffic may be routed away from the town centre. Cumberland Motor Services operate regular local and inter town services along these routes. { {Railways:}British Rail operate a main line service at Workington, trains going both North to Carlisle and South to Barrow-in-Furness.
